original_text: I looked, and I saw a grey horse. The name of the person who was riding the horse was Death. The place for dead people, called Hades, was following near to him. They had authority to kill people in a quarter of the earth. They could kill people in different ways. They could kill them in wars. They could cause people to die because there was no food. They could cause people to become very ill so that they died. They could also cause wild animals to kill people.
korean_text: 내가 보매 청황색 말이 나오는데 그 탄 자의 이름은 사망이니 음부가 그 뒤를 따르더라 그들이 땅 사분의 일의 권세를 얻어 검과 흉년과 사망과 땅의 짐승들로써 죽이더라

sentences.original_text: I looked, and I saw a grey horse.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 보았고, 회색 말 한 마리를 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The name of the person who was riding the horse was Death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 말을 탄 사람의 이름은 죽음이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The place for dead people, called Hades, was following near to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 자들의 곳인 하데스가 그의 가까이 따르고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They had authority to kill people in a quarter of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 사분의 일에서 사람을 죽일 권세를 가졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could kill people in different ways.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 가지 방법으로 사람을 죽일 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could kill them in wars.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전쟁에서 사람들을 죽일 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could cause people to die because there was no food.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 음식이 없어서 사람들이 죽게 할 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could cause people to become very ill so that they died.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들이 아파서 죽게 만들 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could also cause wild animals to kill people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 들짐승이 사람을 죽게 할 수 있었습니다.
